title: I've reached 999 wins, can I get a rioter for 1000?
body:
Having played on and off since 2012, it's taken me a good while to reach 999. Most of my friends reached 1000 a while ago (2 years ago @_@), and each were able to get a rioter to get their 1000th win. May I have the privilege of your company as well?

[Proof of 999](http://i.imgur.com/8XpUgLW.png)
